usergroup.name: Independent Game Developers Rhein-Main
usergroup.description: This group is for everyone in the Rhein-Main area who is interested in game development and would like to exchange with other developers and game designers. The goal is to meet once a month, get to know each other and talk about various topics, e.g. frameworks and tools, marketing your game, monetization or just the love for game development.

meeting.name: Get together and talk about game development ...
meeting.description:
Hi,
let's meet up again and talk about our indie game dev endeavours.
This meetup is supposed to be a casual get-together again like last time but in a more quiet environment.
Marc and Norbert from Sanid offered their office space for the next meetup.
Since Thursday, May 1st is a holiday I thought we could meet on Friday, May 2nd at 4pm, which gives us a little more time to talk and maybe showcase some of the work in progress.
cheers ali
